question: Which city inagurated its first semi-mechanized car parking facility?
explanation: Srinagar Gets First Semi-Mechanised Car Parking Facility at the old KMD stand on the M. A. Road, it was inagurated by Chief Minister, Mehbooba Mufti. This car parking facility would be first of its kind in the State as most of the operations done during car parking would be automatic, including collection of fee and receipts. The drivers will have to just place their vehicles over the automated pellet and it would be automatically placed in the available vacant slot.
